DocAttribute.Name: Prefix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The SI Prefix for defining decimal multiples and submultiples of the unit.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The word, or group of words, by which the SI unit is referred to.
> NOTE  Even though the SI system's base unit for mass is kilogram, the _IfcSIUnit_ for mass is gram if no _Prefix_ is asserted.

DocAttribute.Name: Dimensions
DocAttribute.Documentation: The dimensional exponents of SI units are derived by function _IfcDimensionsForSiUnit_.
